subject: Critical issue: Critical infrastructure issue in k8s-cluster (ap-southeast-1)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical infrastructure issue in k8s-cluster (ap-southeast-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The k8s-cluster in the ap-southeast-1 region is currently under heavy load, with CPU utilization at 93.14% and memory utilization at 97.29%. This level of resource consumption can lead to performance degradation and potential outages if not addressed promptly.

Service: k8s-cluster
Region: ap-southeast-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: infrastructure

Metrics:
{
  "cpu_percent": 93.14,
  "memory_percent": 97.29,
  "disk_io_mbps": 484.62,
  "network_io_mbps": 596.98
}

No workaround available yet.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

extracted_fields.impact: The k8s-cluster is under heavy load, risking performance degradation and potential outages.

merged_extracted_fields.impact: The k8s-cluster is under heavy load, risking performance degradation and potential outages.

current_triage.rationale: The ticket describes a critical infrastructure issue with high resource utilization that can lead to performance degradation and potential outages.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to outage classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P0 priority. Escalated due to P0 critical priority.
